email.title: Facebook – Hack-a-project 2019
email.text:
Facebook Hack-a-project is **closing applications soon**!
For first and second years looking to gain valuable, hands-on programming experience by building real-world applications, Hack-a-project is a great programme. Previous students who went along to Hack-a-project gave very positive feedback, so do be sure to check out this opportunity if you have not yet done so!

This is just a gentle reminder that we are **closing applications** for our 3rd run of **Hack-a-project on Feb 1st 2019**.
This is a 5-week mentoring programme kicking off in February 2019, designed for 1st years of a three year degree and 2nd years of a fourth year degree, looking to apply for a Software Engineering internship with Facebook. Selected students will come to the Facebook office, once a week in the evening to learn about the whole development cycle and build a project as a team via a hackathon!
Each session will also be catered, so come hungry (to learn and to eat!)
Please take a look at the video from our last Hack-a-project to find out more https://www.facebook.com/265781023507354/posts/2024153967670042/.
**If you are interested, please sign-up by following [this](https://hackaproject2019.splashthat.com/) link AND send your CV to LucyKemp@fb.com with the subject headline ‘Hack-a-project – applicant 2019’.**
